title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: I usually stacks bitcoin every week, no matter the price be it low or high. Weather people hype or relegates it, any level of criticism. Keep stacking weather others do same you did or not is personal. Buy little by little but don't displeased yourself to buy bitcoin.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 04, 2023, 04:57:36 AMI usually stacks bitcoin every week, no matter the price be it low or high.Stacking bitcoin weekly is good but sometimes, you should stop when a greed index is high enough.Bitcoin Fear and Greed indexQuoteWeather people hype or relegates it, any level of criticism. Keep stacking weather others do same you did or not is personal. Buy little by little but don't displeased yourself to buy bitcoin.Whether, not weather. Stacking Bitcoin is not related to weather conditions.I collected cool memes in Bitcoin Educational Memes for Bitcoin newbies and I saw those memes are very educational.Stack meme

comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 04, 2023, 04:57:36 AMI usually stacks bitcoin every week, no matter the price be it low or high. Weather people hype or relegates it, any level of criticism. Keep stacking weather others do same you did or not is personal. Buy little by little but don't displeased yourself to buy bitcoin.welp, if u can afford to then that is the best strategy there is.and trust me, i use to do the same but things changed.and i can't stack up anymore as much as i used to and/or want to.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 04, 2023, 04:57:36 AMI usually stacks bitcoin every week, no matter the price be it low or high. Weather people hype or relegates it, any level of criticism. Keep stacking weather others do same you did or not is personal. Buy little by little but don't displeased yourself to buy bitcoin.The investment you make now will definitely bear fruit in the future. Honestly, I'm quite jealous of you who can invest in Bitcoin every week, because I can't do that. At least I can only invest once a month due to limited funds. Hopefully I can increase the value of my investment in the future.

comments.author: Japinat
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 04, 2023, 04:57:36 AMI usually stacks bitcoin every week, no matter the price be it low or high. Weather people hype or relegates it, any level of criticism. Keep stacking weather others do same you did or not is personal. Buy little by little but don't displeased yourself to buy bitcoin.Absolutely, holding onto Bitcoin long-term can be a wise investment strategy, especially if you believe in the future potential of the cryptocurrency. Enduring through bear markets and not panicking when prices dip is a strong indicator of a committed and confident investor. Remember, patience is key in investing, and it's important to stick to your long-term goals. Best of luck in your investment journey, and don't forget that when others panic, it's often the best time to buy.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: As long as the money you're investing is not something that you cannot afford to lose no matter how high or low, you are perfectly fine. There might be some gatekeepers out there (or even here, I am not sure) that will tell you that you are not a "tRuE BitCoIneR" if you don't have these amount of Bitcoin in your wallet.I've been into that situation with my past friends.
